name: Issho
description:
So Issho is a simple Puzzle Platformer about manipulating blocks with gravity powers in space.

Design and Programming by @Kinaetron

Art and Sound Effects by @AsScion

Music by @lana_chan_

The controls are

KEYBOARD

Move - WASD / DIRECTIONS

Jump - Space

Gravity Power - C

Use Gravity Power - WASD / DIRECTIONS

CONTROLLER (360 controller)

Move - Left Stick / Dpad

Jump - A

Gravity Power - Left Trigger

User Gravity Power - Right Stick
